Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='FÖAP00')

BibliographicData.Title: Prefrontal cortical projections to the striatum in macaque monkeys: Evidence for an organization related to prefrontal networks
